description: Checks whether the image specified in a process creation event doesn't refer to an .exe file (caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process)
author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems)
name: Execution of Suspicious File Type Extension
query: (((NOT process.executable.text:("*.exe" OR "*.tmp" OR "*.scr")) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:("System" OR "Registry" OR "MemCompression" OR "vmmem")) OR (process.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\Installer\\MSI*") OR (process.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\DriverStore\\FileRepository\\*") OR ((process.executable.text:"C\:\\Config.Msi\\*" AND process.executable.text:("*.rbf" OR "*.rbs"))) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*" AND process.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\Helper\\*")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Windows\\System32\\*" OR "C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*.com")) OR (process.executable.text:"C\:\\$Extend\\$Deleted\\*")))) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:("-" OR "")) OR (NOT _exists_:process.executable.text) OR (process.parent.executable.text:"C\:\\ProgramData\\Avira\\*") OR ((process.executable.text:"*NVIDIA\\NvBackend\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*.dat")) OR (process.executable.text:"*\\WinSCP.com") OR (process.executable.text:"*C\:\\Users\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*.tmp*" AND process.executable.text:"*CodeSetup*") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\program\\soffice.bin") OR (process.executable.text:("C:\Program Files\EMC NetWorker\Management\GST\apache\cgi-bin\update_jnlp.cgi" OR "C:\Program Files (x86)\EMC NetWorker\Management\GST\apache\cgi-bin\update_jnlp.cgi")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\WINPAKPRO\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\\WINPAKPRO\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*.ngn")) OR (process.executable.text:("C:\Program Files (x86)\MyQ\Server\pcltool.dll" OR "C:\Program Files\MyQ\Server\pcltool.dll")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\Microsoft\ Visual\ Studio\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\ Visual\ Studio*") AND process.executable.text:"*.com")) OR (process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Packages\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\LocalState\\rootfs\\*") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\LZMA_EXE") OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*" AND process.parent.executable.text:"*\\TBT_Dock_Firmware\\GetDockVer32W.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:"C\:\\Program\ Files\\Mozilla\ Firefox\\tobedeleted\\*") OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Windows\UUS\amd64\MoUsoCoreWorker.exe" AND process.executable.text:"C\:\\$Extend\\$Deleted\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*C\:\\Program\ Files\\Common\ Files\\Microsoft\ Shared\\ClickToRun\\OfficeC2RClient.exe*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\/update\ UPDATEORCHESTRATOR\ displaylevel\=False*")) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\services.exe" AND process.executable.text:"*com.docker.service")))))
